name: Thief of Vallas (2019)
description:
Thief of Vallas was made for Stencyl Jam 18 in 10 days. It is a remake of my first ever Stencyl game from 2013. I would like to do more with it at some point, so this version can be thought of as more of a demo.

Storyline in development. In Towers of Vallas (WIP), Marika is searching for the whereabouts of her brother, the scholar Cata, whom she fears may have been seized as a political enemy of the empire. She learns of the Major Haris and the empire's plans to build a new, towering fortress. She sets out to explore the tower, but the empire's soldiers await to welcome her.

Instructions. (Apologies to non-US keyboard users!)

Arrow keys to move
Z : Action 1 (jump)
X : Action 2 (melee attack)
C : Action 3 (special weapon)
V : Action 4 (select special)
M : Mute
P : Pause

Music: DST (nosoapradio.us)
